metadata.name: #4 Time Teleporter #1/20
metadata.description:
#4 marks the place and date that this collection was conceived, on 1 Dec 2022, in Miami, just hours after the WoW gala ended for me.

#4 also encapsulates a dream, to hold a book reading in 2026, when The Writing of Tempus Flair is complete and published. At the reading, there will be screens displaying the digital art that have been minted on the blockchain, along its journey with me as I continue the lonely road of writing a book to completion.

#1, #2 and #3 were minted in another collection, which will be abandoned, as the wallet that I minted them on was compromised on 2 Jan 2023. The first 11 collectors of #1 and #2 are transferred new editions of #4 with much gratitude from me.
